ch0139_00_sana/0101_0701_02_10:
I was waiting for you to come! Let’s make some
fun memories together! ♪
ch0139_00_sana/7101_0701_01_10: Calem and Serena are such cool friends!
ch0139_00_sana/7101_0701_02_10:
I’ve gotta work hard on Pasio so I don’t fall
behind them!
ch0139_00_sana/7101_0701_03_10: Let’s work hard together! We can do this!
ch0139_00_sana/7102_0701_01_10:
Pasio has so many fun places. I bet
everyone’s excited! ♪
ch0139_00_sana/7102_0701_02_10:
Even the kinda scary-looking people look like
they’re having fun here.
ch0139_00_sana/7102_0701_03_10: Everyone should get along! Don’t you think?
ch0139_00_sana/7103_0701_01_10: My goal is to create new memories!
ch0139_00_sana/7103_0701_02_10:
I’m gonna meet all kinds of people and make it
my treasure!
ch0139_00_sana/7104_0701_01_10: I always dreamed of going to a faraway region!
ch0139_00_sana/7104_0701_02_10:
When I’m on Pasio, I make fun memories
every day!
ch0139_00_sana/7104_0701_03_10: OK, I’m gonna do sooo many fun things today!
ch0139_00_sana/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s do some
puzzles together!
ch0139_00_sana/7105_0701_02_10: Hehehe, I really like solving puzzles. ♪
ch0139_00_sana/7105_0701_03_10:
If you solve it quicker than me, I might give you
a treat!
ch0139_00_sana/1701_0701_01_10: I’m gonna give this to you.
ch0139_00_sana/2501_0701_01_10:
Since I meet many different people on Pasio, every
day is so fun for me.
ch0139_00_sana/2501_0701_02_10: Maybe I could make a hundred friends!
ch0139_00_sana/2501_0701_03_10:
It’d be so cool if I could do that! Our dreams keep
getting bigger.
ch0139_00_sana/2501_0702_01_10:
I’m gonna make a lot of fun memories, and when I
return to Kalos, I’ll tell everyone about them!
ch0139_00_sana/2501_0702_02_10: I’ll also tell everyone about you, too!
ch0139_00_sana/2511_0701_01_10:
If you make a lot of friends, you’ll also make so
many wonderful memories!
ch0139_00_sana/2511_0701_02_10:
Memories are treasures that last forever! When I
make a memory, I wanna make it so I can
cherish it!
ch0139_00_sana/2511_0701_04_10: OK then, let’s start making some cute memories!
ch0139_00_sana/2511_0702_01_10:
I want to make my memories with you on Pasio
my greatest treasure.
ch0139_00_sana/2511_0702_02_10: So let’s spend even more time together!
ch0139_00_sana/3001_0701_01_10:
MORNING! I’m starting the day at full volume!
Just my way of sharing my energy!
ch0139_00_sana/3003_0701_01_10:
As always, there’s no time for dawdling today!
We’ve gotta get out there and make
more memories!
ch0139_00_sana/3005_0701_01_10:
Oof, I’m getting really sleepy... Guess it’s time for
me and my Pokémon to head off to the world
of dreams.
